content: In #18774 LocalRing has been (rightly) renamed to IsLocalRing, because it is Prop-valued. Given the definition of a docs#DiscreteValuationRing, I would propose that we also rename DiscreteValuationRing to IsDiscreteValuationRing. Any objection?
I can post this in the PR reviewschannel, but perhaps here is enough.
I can't believe I called it that -- this is one of my pet hates nowadays! Yes please let's call it Is!
